metadata.title: English-Ukrainian Computer Glossary and Short Glossary of Audio-Visual Technology
metadata.creator: Fedynsky, Peter
metadata.note: The computer age has posed another challenge for the Ukrainian language to keep pace with developments in science and technology. Those who speak Ukrainian must be able to coin new terms or effectively assimilate foreign ones to keep the language up to date. This research paper was published to help foster a better Ukrainian technical vocabulary and to develop the same power as the literary language. The glossary may be used for for experts who wish to compile an authoritative and preferably computerized lexicon of Ukrainian computer terms.
metadata.publisher: Edmonton, Alta. : Canadian Institute of Ukrainian Studies Press, University of Alberta
